actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain customs entries of nuclear fuel assemblies.

summary.text: Provides for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain customs entries as if, at the time such entries were made, a specified note to the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States regarding nuclear fuel assemblies was in effect.

titles.title: To provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain customs entries of nuclear fuel assemblies.
